channel.title: parquet on l1x/dev
channel.description: Recent content in parquet on l1x/dev

item.title: Compressing AWS S3 logs after getting HackerNewsed
item.description: Abstract One of my previous articles about Firecracker and RPI got posted on HN, and I just realized that many months ago, I enabled logging on the S3 bucket hosting this content. I quickly wanted to peek into the stats, and when I discovered that Athena could not process compressed S3 logs. I was already working on a larger AWS codebase in F#, so I decided to write a tool that can download the raw logs from S3 and merge all the small files, convert it to Parquet and upload those back.
